amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase the funds appropriated in the bill for VA Medical Care by $183.5 million; and offset the increased funding by reducing funding for NASA and the National Science Foundation by $89.5 million, and $235 million respectively.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, not preprinted in the Congressional Record, to increase the funds appropriated in the bill for VA Medical Care by $183.5 million. The amendment would offset the increased funding by reducing funding for NASA and the National Science Foundation by $89.5 million, and $235 million respectively.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ensign amendment (A023) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 296 (Roll no. 604).
